markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTheForgottenSanctum/) in {{lax3}}. ## Synopsis Now that [Bekarna](/bekarna/) has her grimoire back, she remembers why she came to the Black Isles in the first place - to recover a fallen star. Locating a sample of starmetal will enable her to scribe a unique spell, and she promises to share the results of her research with the watcher. She is certain that a celestial catalyst - a piece of charged starmetal - can be found somewhere in the Halls Obscured. A falling star struck this location recently, so the Watcher may have to look deeper. ## Walkthrough * Deeper is an understatement. The quest will not be possible to complete until the player reaches [The Upper Bowels](/theUpperBowels/). The starmetal can be obtained at the Celestial Remnant near the massive piece of Wael. * To avoid a fight, the souls in the starmetal must first be calmed. There's two ways of doing this: ** Sacrificing the pet [Giftwrapper](/giftwrapper/). ** Or by having read the book [On Celestial Spectres: Visitors from Farther than Beyond](/onCelestialSpectresVisitorsFromFartherThanBeyond/) and passing two Metaphysics checks: *** '''Metaphysics 15''': ''If you allow the spirits to commune with your soul, ig might prove a suitable distraction to claim a piece of the metal for yourself.'' *** Metaphysics: ''Try and commune with the spirits.'' *** '''Metaphysics 20''': ''You open a metaphysical bridge between your soul and the entities inhabiting the mineral.'' *** The spirits will understand what your intention is, and aren't really bothered when they see that you're not hostile to them. They will let you snap of a piece of metal without incident. * Collecting the [Fragment of Starmetal](/fragmentOfStarmetal/) without doing either will cause Celestial Spectres to attack. * Once they are gone, it's a simple matter of returning to Bekarna to receive her grimoire and a unique tool, the [Celestial Agitator](/celestialAgitator/), that allows for spawning star spirits. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX03_Forgotten_Sanctum/lax03_tsk_04_celestial_magic_03.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Out of Eternal Horizons''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Now that Bekarna has her grimoire back, she remembers why she came to the Black Isles in the first place - to recover a fallen star. Locating a sample of starmetal will enable her to scribe a unique spell, and she promises to share the results of her research. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Find a piece of starmetal in the Halls Obscured.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Bekarna is certain that a celestial catalyst - a piece of charged starmetal - can be found somewhere in the Halls Obscured. A falling star struck this location recently, so I may have to look deeper. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | According to a book I found, unusual spectres might be protective of the starmetal when I find it. I may be able to appease them by offering a small part of my own essence. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Bring the starmetal to Bekarna.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I found what Bekarna was looking for. She'll be pleased if I returned it to her in the Temple of Revelation. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Bekarna is dead. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | Bekarna succeeded in scribing her own spell. |}
